bibl.title: Alexander the Great's Tombolos at Tyre and Alexandria, Eastern Mediterranean. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Meteo-marine and geomorphological contexts. - 3. Methods and data acquisition. - 4. Results. - 5. Discussion and interpretations [see in part.: 5.3. Description and interpretation of the tombolo stratigraphy at Alexandria]. - 6. Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Marriner Nick, Jean-Philippe Goiran et Christophe Morhange, Alexander the Great's Tombolos at Tyre and Alexandria, Eastern Mediterranean. Avec résumé en anglais.
Geomorphology 100 (2008) pp. 377-400, 20 figg. n./bl. et coul. [Accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.archeorient.mom.fr/FICHES/fiches_actuelles/GOIRANbiblio.html >.]

1. Introduction. - 2. Meteo-marine and geomorphological contexts. - 3. Methods and data acquisition. - 4. Results. - 5. Discussion and interpretations [see in part.: 5.3. Description and interpretation of the tombolo stratigraphy at Alexandria]. - 6. Conclusions.
